note: ## 20 Articles on Graph Neural Networks (GNNs) up to 2021:

title: **Fundamentals and Overview:**
**"Graph Neural Networks: A Review of Methods and Applications"** by Zhou et al
- A comprehensive overview of GNNs, covering different architectures, applications, and challenges
**"Deep Learning on Graphs: A Survey"** by Wu et al
- A detailed survey of GNNs, focusing on their architectures, learning algorithms, and applications
**"Graph Neural Networks: A Comprehensive Review"** by Zhang et al
- A review of GNNs, covering their theoretical foundations, architectures, and applications
**"A Gentle Introduction to Graph Neural Networks"** by Michael Bronstein
- A beginner-friendly introduction to GNNs, explaining their concepts and applications
**"Graph Neural Networks: From Foundations to Frontiers"** by Bronstein et al
- A comprehensive overview of GNNs, covering their theoretical foundations, architectures, and applications
**Architectures and Algorithms:**
**"Convolutional Neural Networks on Graphs with Fast Localized Spectral Filtering"** by Defferrard et al
- Introduces the concept of spectral graph convolutions and proposes a fast and efficient algorithm
**"Semi-Supervised Classification with Graph Convolutional Networks"** by Kipf and Welling
- Proposes a simple and effective GCN architecture for semi-supervised learning
**"Graph Attention Networks"** by Veličković et al
- Introduces the concept of attention mechanisms in GNNs, allowing for adaptive feature aggregation
- Proposes a GNN architecture for inductive learning, enabling generalization to unseen nodes
**"GraphSAGE: Inductive Representation Learning on Large Graphs"** by Hamilton et al
- Introduces a scalable GNN architecture for inductive learning on large graphs
**"Molecular Graph Convolutions: Moving Beyond Fingerprints"** by Duvenaud et al
- Demonstrates the application of GNNs for predicting molecular properties
**"Learning to Discover Social Relationships from Network Structure"** by Rossi et al
- Applies GNNs to learn social relationships from network structure
**"Graph Neural Networks for Traffic Forecasting"** by Yao et al
- Explores the use of GNNs for traffic forecasting
**"Graph Neural Networks for Drug Discovery"** by Zitnik et al
- Reviews the application of GNNs in drug discovery
**"Graph Neural Networks for Natural Language Processing"** by Bastos and Gamallo (2020) - Explores the use of GNNs in natural language processing tasks
**Challenges and Future Directions:**
**"Challenges of Graph Neural Networks"** by Wu et al
- Discusses the challenges of GNNs, including scalability, explainability, and robustness
**"Beyond Graph Neural Networks: Towards a Deeper Understanding of Graph Structure"** by Li et al
- Explores the limitations of GNNs and proposes future directions for graph representation learning
**"Graph Neural Networks: A Review of Methods and Applications"** by Zhou et al
- Discusses the challenges and future directions of GNNs
**"Deep Learning on Graphs: A Survey"** by Wu et al
- Discusses the challenges and future directions of GNNs
**"Graph Neural Networks: From Foundations to Frontiers"** by Bronstein et al
- Discusses the challenges and future directions of GNNs
**Note:** This list is not exhaustive and there are many other excellent articles on GNNs. You can find more articles by searching online databases like Google Scholar or arXiv.org
